description: Transplant committee review over time single response items.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this contact. This is only populated if you use IntraConnect.

columns.name: TXP_COMM_DECISION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The transplant committee review decision on whether a patient can be listed for a transplant.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Pending


Declined


Needs Re-presentation


Remain Active


Make Active


Make Inactive


Remain Inactive


Remove


Approved

columns.name: TXP_COMMITTEE_DT
columns.description: The expected date the transplant committee will review the candidate.

columns.name: TXP_CHAIR_ID
columns.description: The chair of the transplant committee review.

columns.name: TXP_COMMITTEE_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of committee review.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Blood and Marrow


Lung


Pancreas


Liver


Kidney


Kidney/Pancreas


Intestine


Heart


Heart/Lung


Islet


Face


Upper Limb


Abdominal Wall


Leg


Penis


Trachea


Uterus


Larynx

columns.name: TXP_ELIG_OTHER
columns.description: Transplant waitlist eligibility other criteria for committee review.

columns.name: TXP_ABS_CIND_OTHER
columns.description: Other absolute contraindications, which cause a transplant patient to be denied a transplant.

columns.name: TXP_REL_CIND_OTHER
columns.description: Other relative contraindications, which either cause a transplant patient to be denied a transplant or require the patient to be re-evaluated later.

columns.name: TXP_CR_EPSD_PHASE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The phase of the transplant episode at the time of documenting the decision in the committee review encounter.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Referral


Evaluation


Waitlist


Admitted for Transplant


Transplanted

columns.name: TXP_CR_EPSD_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The status of the transplant episode at the time of documenting the decision in the committee review encounter.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Active


Internal Hold


Declined


Approved


Removed


Denied Follow-up


Denied Not Followed


Inactive


Deferred


Deferred Follow-up


Deferred Not Followed


Ineligible


Ready for Committee


Ready for Listing


Approved for Listing


Approved for Live Donor Only


Active Follow-up


Reporting Follow-up Only


Not Followed
